data.title: YMCA Blue Ridge Assembly
data.meta_description: "YMCA Blue Ridge Assembly works to put Christian principles into practice through programs that build a healthy spirit, mind and body for all. We are a premier destination for developing, empowering, and inspiring values-based leaders to strengthen the foundations of their community."
data.text:
A Space to Gather and Grow Together

YMCA Blue Ridge Assembly offers over 25 indoor and outdoor meeting spaces across campus that you can choose from – and each can be set up tailored to fit your group’s unique needs. Multiple buildings on our campus offer spaces ranging from large auditoriums to small breakout rooms that provide quiet spots for discussions, gatherings and group time. Our staff will prepare your meeting space with an appropriate set-up of tables, chairs, audiovisual equipment and any other needs prior to your arrival.

Check out our meeting space options. >>

Achieve, Explore and Learn on the Mountain

We offer several guided programming options modified to fit the focus, needs and goals of your group or conference. From high and low ropes challenge courses and adventure programs like archery, mountain biking and hiking, to team building activities and outdoor education opportunities, there is something for everyone at YMCA Blue Ridge Assembly. Whether you are with a school field trip, church retreat, family reunion, YMCA, or another group, enrich your Mountaintop experience with a tailored program agenda.

Check out our group program options. >>
